subject: Pedal plate
description_text: I recently ordered a set of the plus X pedals and I noticed that they didn’t come with a pedal plate. Was it forgotten in shipping or does it not come with one?

conversations.body_text: Hi Edan Cohen,  Please provide your order number, and I’ll check whether the order includes the baseplate or if it was shipped separately due to temporary stock shortages.

SSN5599


On Fri, Jan 9, 2026 at 10:45 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Edan Cohen,  I’ve checked your order SSN5599, and it does not include a baseplate. The specification clearly states “without Baseplate”. If you need one, you can purchase the baseplate separately.

I saw that it is $50 more to add the baseplate to the pedal set but $80
separately? Is there any way you can discount the base plate to the same
price as if I was to add it to the pedals?

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026 at 9:54 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Edan Cohen,       The shipping cost calculation is different for split shipments, and since each package is quite heavy, the shipping cost is correspondingly higher.

The shipping isn’t free either way I paid for shipping on the order

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026 at 10:13 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Edan Cohen,    Our operations team has confirmed that the shipping cost is set correctly. The base shipping fee for one shipment with two items is different from that for a single item per shipment. Shipping items separately results in a higher cost, in accordance with the logistics carrier’s pricing rules.

Is there any discount at all that can be applied?

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026 at 10:44 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Edan Cohen,  Our baseplate has a very limited profit margin, and the shipping cost is quite high, so unfortunately we’re not able to offer a discount.
